name: Do-Not-Forget-Me
description: A write pad for catching that thought before it flies away... In MarkDown.

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . do-not-forget-me --overwrite --asar=true --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=src/assets/icons/win/icon.ico --prune=true --out=release-builds --version-string.CompanyName="pixeline SPRL" --version-string.FileDescription="A write pad for catching that thought before it flies away... In MarkDown." --version-string.ProductName="Do Not Forget Me"
scripts.package-dmg: electron-installer-dmg "release-builds/Do Not Forget Me-darwin-x64/Do Not Forget Me.app" DoNotForgetMe --out=release-builds --overwrite --icon=src/assets/icons/mac/icon.icns

author: pixeline
